reminder: Page title for special page of reminder manager
specialreminder:
Name of the special page for reminder
{{Identical|Reminder}}
prefs-reminder:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:Preferences}} Special:Preferences], headline for reminder section in preferences.
{{Identical|Reminder}}
apihelp-bs-reminder-store-description:
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-reminder-store}}
Describes the API endpoint that provides reminder data
apihelp-bs-reminder-tasks-description:
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-reminder-tasks}}
Describes the API endpoint that handles reminder tasks
bs-reminder-pref-DefaultReminderPeriod: Label for the setting of default reminder period
bs-reminder-pref-DefaultReminderPeriod-h: Help text for the setting of the reminder period.
bs-reminder-pref-SetReminderOnCreate: Label for the setting whether to set reminder on article creation
bs-reminder-menu_entry-create: More menu item for creating reminders
bs-reminder-menu_entry-show:
Personal menu item for displaying reminders
{{Identical|Reminder}}
bs-reminder-unknown-page-msg: Error message when someone tries to create a reminder for a page which doesn't exist.
bs-reminder-unknown-user-msg: Error message when someone tries to create a reminder for a user which doesn't exist.
bs-reminder-date-label: Label for date field to remind at
bs-reminder-create-reminder-label: Label for checkbox to create reminder
bs-reminder-create-title:
Title for dialog to create reminder
{{Identical|Reminder}}
bs-reminder-create-success: Message to display when the reminder has been created successfully.
bs-reminder-create-error: Message to display when the reminder could not be created.
bs-reminder-update-success: Message to display when the reminder has been updated successfully.
bs-reminder-update-error: Message to display when the reminder could not be updated.
bs-reminder-header-pagename:
Label of the column for page
{{Identical|Page}}
bs-reminder-header-username:
Label of the column for user
{{Identical|User}}
bs-reminder-header-date: Label of the column for reminder date
bs-reminder-title-delete: Title for dialog to delete reminder
bs-reminder-text-delete:
Confirmation question to be displayed when user wants to delete a reminder.

* $1 is the number of reminders which will be deleted - use for PLURAL distinction.
bs-reminder-error-valid-reminder: Message to display when the user tries to delete an invalid reminder.
bs-reminder-error-owner-reminder: Message to display when the user tries to delete other than own reminders.
bs-reminder-delete-success: Message to display when the reminder has been deleted successfully.
bs-reminder-delete-error:
Message to display when an error occurred on delete
* $1 is the text of the error
bs-reminder-delete-error-unkown: Message to display when the reminder could not be deleted.
bs-reminder-save-error:
Message to display when an error occurred on save
* $1 is the text of the error
bs-reminder-save-error-unkown: Message to display when the reminder could not be saved.
bs-reminder-create-no-actions: Message to display when some parameters are missing.
bs-reminder-save-success: Message to display when the Reminder has been created successfully.
bs-reminder-user-label: Label for user field in create/edit dialoge
bs-reminder-comment-label: Label for comment field in create/edit dialoge
bs-reminder-header-comment:
Label of the column for comment
{{Identical|Comment}}
bs-reminder-article-label:
Label for article field in create/edit dialogue
{{Identical|Page}}
bs-reminder-dlg-btn-manager-label: Label for the dialog button to open the reminder manager
bs-reminder-other-user-not-allowed: Error message when a user is not allowed to create a reminder for another user
bs-reminder-pref-DisableReminderForNS: Label for the reminder user setting selection, that prevents the creating reminders for selected namespaces
bs-reminder-navigation-link-title:
Title for Grapical List toggle Button
{{Identical|Reminder}}
bs-reminder-navigation-link-text:
Text for Grapical List toggle Button
{{OIdentical|Reminder}}
bs-reminder-nav-link-title-reminder: Label for Reminder in the side column
bs-reminder-flyout-upcoming: Message when there are reminders due in the future, but not today - $1 - number of days remaining, always greater than 0
bs-reminder-flyout-upcoming-due: Message when there is reminder already due, today or in the past
bs-reminder-flyout-upcoming-none: Message when there are no reminders for this user for this page
bs-reminder-flyout-form-title: Title of form for creating reminders
bs-reminder-flyout-grid-title: Title of the grid showing other user's reminders for this page
bs-reminder-flyout-manager-btn-label: Label for the button leading to Reminder special page
bs-reminder-flyout-manager-my-reminder-b: Label for the button leading to user's Reminder special page
bs-reminder-privacy-transparency-working:
Privacy handler export for reminder of a user
* $1 - Full page title of the page, the reminder is set on
* $2 - Date of the reminder
* $3 - Comment of the reminder
echo-category-title-notification-bs-remi: Message to display on user preferences for notifications
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-reminder-cat: Tooltip for Echo notification category bs-reminder-cat
notification-bs-reminder-one-week-subjec:
Subject of email notification to remember article when it is due one week from today. $1 - the title of the article
* $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-one-week-email-:
Body of email notification to remember article when it is due one week from now.
* $1 - title of the article
* $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-one-week-web-bo:
Body of web notification to remember article when it is due one week from now. $1 - title of the article
* $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-today-subject:
Subject of email notification to remember article when it is due today $1 - the title of the article
* $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-today-email-bod:
Body of email notification to remember article when it is due today.
* $1 - the title of the article
* $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-today-web-body:
Body of web notification to remember article when it is due today. $1 - the title of the article
* $2 - the comment of the reminder
bs-reminder-ordinal-last: Numbers greater than 4 are last by default
bs-reminder-monthly-on-day-prefix: Prefix for monthly repeated reminder on concrete day
bs-reminder-repeat-interval-day: Label for repeated reminder interval type day
bs-reminder-repeat-interval-week: Label for repeated reminder interval type week
bs-reminder-repeat-interval-month: Label for repeated reminder interval type month
bs-reminder-repeat-interval-year: Label for repeated reminder interval type year
bs-reminder-date-repeat-ends-on-label: Label for date when reminder ends field
bs-reminder-start-date-greater-end-date: Error message when end date of repeating reminder less than start date
bs-reminder-header-is-repeating:
Label of the column for Is repeating
{{Identical|Is repeating}}
bs-reminder-no:
Just no. Used for showing that reminder is not repeating
{{identical|No}}
bs-reminder-invalid-type: Error message for when given data for the type field is not valid
bs-reminder-header-type:
Label for data field that holds the type of the reminder
{{Identical|Type}}
